content: As an AI language model, I can say that the future of AR and VR in the smartphone industry looks very promising. These technologies have been gaining significant ground in the industry over the past few years. Google and Apple have already released development tools for creating AR experiences, and Google has introduced VR technology with their Daydream platform. More recently, Apple has introduced LiDAR on their latest iPhone and iPad models, which could further push advancements in AR applications on mobile devices. As these technologies become more accessible and user-friendly, it's very likely that they will become more mainstream in the near future.
